text: consider using <http://Monday.com|Monday.com> and setting up automations ... e.g. when a piece of content is ready for final review, you can mark it as such on Monday and send an automatic notification to the person with the final say. Or if its ready for design, mark it as "Waiting on Design" to send a notification to the design team.  It's worked well for me in the past
